meanings.sent1: The colors black and white are antithetical.
meanings.sent2: Her cheerful demeanor was antithetical to his somber mood.
meanings.sent3: It's like trying to mix oil and water - completely antithetical!
meanings.sent4: Their viewpoints on the issue were as antithetical as fire and ice.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful silence of the forest was antithetical to the noisy city streets.

meanings.definition: Contrary or opposite in character or nature
meanings.sent1: His lazy attitude was antithetical to her hardworking nature.
meanings.sent2: The warm sunshine was antithetical to the cold wind blowing.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog's relationship was truly antithetical - they never got along!
meanings.sent4: The old and new architecture stood antithetical to each other in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The sweet taste of the candy was antithetical to the bitter medicine she had to take.

meanings.sent1: His actions were antithetical to his words.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's findings were antithetical to the popular belief.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle and ride a unicycle at the same time seemed antithetical.
meanings.sent4: Her calm exterior was antithetical to the chaos in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The politician's promises were antithetical to his actual policies.
